Eightieth session 
Third Committee 
Agenda item 67 
Promotion and protection of the rights of children 
 
 
 
 
 
Belarus and Russian Federation: amendment to revised draft resolution 
A/C.3/80/L.20/Rev.1 
 
 
 
 Rights of the child 
 
 
 
After the fourteenth preambular paragraph, insert a new preambular paragraph 
reading: 
 
Reaffirming that, in accordance with article 5 of the Convention, States 
Parties shall respect the responsibilities, rights and duties of parents or, where 
applicable, the members of the extended family or community as provided for 
by local custom, legal guardians or other persons legally responsible for the 
child, to provide, in a manner consistent with the evolving capacities of the 
child, appropriate direction and guidance in the exercise by the child of his or 
her rights, particularly regarding health and education,
